message: Alice, let's be pragmatic—each round further reduces my effective gains due to inflation. I know you value fairness, but delaying hurts both of us (especially me). Please accept this offer so we can wrap things up quickly.
Meet in the middle, considering inflation!

Alice, every round that passes chips away at my share's value—I'm feeling the pinch of inflation more than ever. To avoid further losses for both of us, I’m offering you a deal that slightly favors you. Let's settle now so you secure your fair part and I minimize my devaluation.
